auth/user-disabled: This user account has been disabled.
auth/user-not-found: No account found with this email address.
auth/email-already-in-use: This email address is already in use.
auth/weak-password: The password is too weak. Please choose a stronger one.
auth/network-request-failed: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
auth/too-many-requests: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.
auth/internal-error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
auth/operation-not-allowed: This sign-in method is not enabled for your project.
auth/account-exists-with-different-crede: An account already exists with the same email address but different sign-in credentials.
